attributes.action: allow snoop dogg into the UK to perform his concert
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Snoop Dogg has been denied a visa due to violence in previous years, Snoop was an EX-gang member and EX-drug dealer, he is on the road to change. No one can change over night. 

But yet John Reid has denied him Visa, to perform the highlights of his tour in the UK. And have made many citizens very unhappy and angry with the UK Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
